title: How to stop colored disk appearing on desk top when call ends
content:
When a phone call comes in, it leaves a colored disk on the desktop. It contains the initial of the person that just called. It is the same colored disk in my phone contacts list.

I know I can slide it down to make it go away. 

How do I make it not show up at all? I really dislike that extra step required to eliminate it. I don't know, but it seems unnecessary to require an action once the call has ended.
